# messageIdentifier

**Instance Property**

An identifier for selecting the main message that the subscription offer sheet presents to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var messageIdentifier: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicSubscriptionOffer/MessageIdentifier/join].
